stories.titleEn: Personalized CRISPR treatment saved a baby with a rare disease
stories.titleZh: 個人化 CRISPR 基因編輯療法救了一名罹患罕見疾病的嬰兒
stories.summaryEn: Doctors created a custom gene-editing therapy for a specific mutation, opening a path for more ultra-rare disease treatments.
stories.summaryZh: 醫療團隊針對特定突變設計客製化基因編輯療法，為更多超罕見疾病治療開啟新路。

stories.titleEn: Needle-free health sensors are getting real
stories.titleZh: 免針式健康感測器正逐漸成真
stories.summaryEn: Wearables are moving toward real-time monitoring of glucose and hydration without finger-prick blood tests.
stories.summaryZh: 穿戴裝置正朝向即時監測血糖與水分狀態，並減少指尖採血需求。

stories.titleEn: AI agents are shifting from chat to action
stories.titleZh: AI 代理正從聊天走向實際執行
stories.summaryEn: New agentic systems can handle multi-step workflows like planning and bookings with less manual coordination.
stories.summaryZh: 新一代 AI 代理可處理規劃與預訂等多步驟流程，減少人工協調負擔。

stories.titleEn: A blood test is being trialed to detect around 50 cancers early
stories.titleZh: 一項血液檢測正進行試驗，目標及早發現約 50 種癌症
stories.summaryEn: Large clinical trials are testing whether early signal detection in blood can improve diagnosis timing and survival rates.
stories.summaryZh: 大型臨床試驗正驗證血液早期訊號偵測能否提早診斷並提升存活率。

stories.titleZh: 3D 列印房屋正逐漸實用化
stories.summaryEn: Construction teams are using robotic printing to build houses faster and with less material waste.
stories.summaryZh: 建築團隊使用機器人列印技術，加快房屋建造並降低材料浪費。
